overview: Named a Technology Pioneer by the World Economic Forum in 2002, Tom Rowley is a seasoned technology executive with a successful track record of bringing game-changing products to market. Prior to joining Truviso, Tom Rowley was CEO for StarVox Communications, a Santa Clara-based provider of integrated voice and data services. Tom has also held CEO positions at Preventsys, a supplier of enterprise security policy management software; Counterpane Internet Security, a managed security services provider; Veridicom, a spin-off of Lucent Technologyâ€™s Bell Labs providing silicon fingerprint readers; and Centigram, a leader in the voice messaging market. Tom Rowley holds two patents with the U.S. Patent Office, and has lectured on how to build a venture-backed companies for business schools at Stanford University, University of California at Berkeley and Santa Clara University.
